arts.ttl: What happened after Newcastle win spoke volumes as Marc Guehi move backfires
arts.sum: Bruno Guimaraes' clever outside of the boot pass sent Jacob Murphy racing down the right and the 30-year-old pulled the ball back to Alexander Isak, whose first-time effort was palmed away by the Crystal Palace goalkeeper. Those words could just so easily have been uttered by boss Eddie Howe, who sent another congratulatory message to Tindall at full-time, after Newcastle leapfrogged Nottingham Forest in the table and moved four points clear of champions Manchester City and five points clear of Chelsea with just half a dozen games to go.

arts.ttl: Newcastle have what City, Chelsea & Forest don't in huge Champions League boost
arts.sum: Yet, Newcastle look streets ahead of Nottingham Forest, Manchester City and Chelsea in terms of both consistency and confidence. The pair of wins Jason Tindall has overseen in recent days has only added to the post-final confidence that a spot in the Champions League awaits.

arts.ttl: Alexander Isak told to reject Arsenal and Liverpool for Premier League rival
arts.sum: Newcastle striker Alexander Isak has been heavily linked with a move away from St James' Park and former Chelsea midfielder Gus Poyet has urged the Blues to sign him

arts.ttl: FPL notes: Isak finally gets his goal, Murphy + Barnes superb
arts.sum: Notes from St James’ Park The post FPL notes: Isak finally gets his goal, Murphy + Barnes superb appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Tindall praises Newcastle 'consistency' in Howe's absence
arts.sum: Newcastle assistant head coach Jason Tindall praises Newcastle for their performances in the absence of manager Eddie Howe, who continues to recover from pneumonia.

arts.ttl: Palace could not cope with Newcastle intensity - Glasner
arts.sum: Crystal Palace boss Oliver Glasner says his side couldn not cope with Newcastle's intensity in their 5-0 loss at St James' Park.

arts.ttl: Jason Tindall comfortable in Newcastle hotseat as Eddie Howe continues recovery
arts.sum: Tindall has been in charge for the last two games with Howe in hospital.

arts.ttl: Jacob Murphy names shock Newcastle United teammate who taught him to cross as big question answered
arts.sum: "I would say, probably by crossing, the biggest help was my former teammate Matt Ritchie," the winger revealed. Jacob Murphy led Newcastle United to the perfect night as they beat Crystal Palace 5-0 at St James' Park to climb to third in the standings.

arts.ttl: Jacob Murphy's tunnel confession after Newcastle move that trumped Sandro Tonali
arts.sum: Murphy said he was always going to shoot because he felt like the mood took him because of the sizzling form the Magpies are in right now. Just like Sandro Tonali's goal Murphy unleashed from an acute angle to leave Dean Henderson beaten all ends up.

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner urges Crystal Palace players to put performance at Newcastle ‘in the bin’ after heavy defeat
arts.sum: Newcastle went up the other end three minutes later and doubled their lead on the counter-attack when Harvey Barnes’ cross deflected off Marc Guehi and wrong-footed Henderson. Oliver Glasner says his Crystal Palace side have to quickly forget their 5-0 humbling at Newcastle United on Wednesday night.
